name: AngelsCreed
description: Angels Creed Is A New Play-To-Earn RPG Game Built On Binance Smart Chain. The Players Can Create NFT Game Characters, And Enter This Fantastic World Which Is Divided Between Light And Darkness. Surrounded By Magical Heros, The Players Will Build Their Own Teams, And Become The Most Powerful Of The Angels Creed World. Enchant, Enhance And Socket Your Items With Gems, Tame Your Mounts And Become The Most Attractive Character Between Thousands Of Players! The Knight Or The Magician That You Will Be, Can Specify Its Skills In Order To Masterize A Unique Character. The Players Will Become The Hero Who Will Save The World From Evil.
